languages.text: {n}Когда жестокий оскал искажает лицо Винтерскейла, старик бросается что-то нашептывать в странное украшение, напоминающее морскую раковину. Бурые искры расцветают в волосах Вольного Торговца, а из вашего рта вдруг вырывается облачко пара.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Когда жестокий оскал искажает лицо Винтерскейла, старик бросается что-то нашептывать в странное украшение, напоминающее морскую раковину. Бурые искры расцветают в волосах Вольного Торговца, а из вашего рта вдруг вырывается облачко пара.{/n}

languages.text: {n}As Calligos bares his teeth ominously, the old man quickly starts whispering something into a strange seashell-like adornment he wears. Brown sparks flash in Calligos's hair, and a cloud of steam suddenly bursts from your mouth.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когда жестокий оскал искажает лицо Винтерскейла, старик бросается что-то нашептывать в странное украшение, напоминающее морскую раковину. Бурые искры расцветают в волосах Вольного Торговца, а из вашего рта вдруг вырывается облачко пара.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}When a cruel grin distorts Winterscale's face, the old man quickly starts to whisper something into a strange decoration, reminescent of a seashell. Brown sparks bloom in the Rogue Trader's hair, and from your mouth suddenly bursts a cloud of steam.{/n}

{n}When a cruel grin distorts Winterscale's face, the old man quickly starts to whisper something into a strange decoration, reminescent of a seashell. Brown sparks bloom in the Rogue Trader's hair, and from your mouth suddenly bursts a cloud of steam.{/n}

{n}When a cruel grin distorts Winterscale's face, the old man quickly starts to whisper something into a strange decoration, reminiscent of a seashell. Brown sparks bloom in the Rogue Trader's hair, and from your mouth suddenly bursts a cloud of steam.{/n}

{n}When a cruel grin distorts Winterscale's face, the old man quickly starts to whisper something into a strange decoration, reminiscent of a seashell. Brown sparks bloom in the Rogue Trader's hair, and from your mouth suddenly bursts a cloud of steam.{/n}

{n}As Calligos bares his teeth ominously, the old man quickly starts whispering something into a strange seashell-like adornment he wears. Brown sparks flash in Calligos's hair, and a cloud of steam suddenly bursts from your mouth.{/n}

{n}As Calligos bares his teeth ominously, the old man quickly starts whispering something into a strange seashell-like adornment he wears. Brown sparks flash in Calligos's hair, and a cloud of steam suddenly bursts from your mouth.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Calligos lanza una sonrisa ominosa y el anciano se apresura a susurrar algo en un extraño ornamento que te recuerda a una caracola. El cabello del Comerciante Independiente despide chispas marrones, y una nube de vapor brota repentinamente de tu boca.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Calligos bares his teeth ominously, the old man quickly starts whispering something into a strange seashell-like adornment he wears. Brown sparks flash in Calligos's hair, and a cloud of steam suddenly bursts from your mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando una sonrisa cruel deforma el rostro de Winterscale, el anciano se apresura a susurrar algo en un extraño ornamento que te recuerda a una caracola. El cabello del Comerciante Independiente despide chispas marrones, y una nube de vapor brota repentinamente de tu boca.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当卡里戈斯不祥地露出牙齿时，老人迅速对着身上某个形似海贝的古怪饰物呢喃起来。棕色的火花在卡里戈斯头发上炸开，一团蒸汽突然从你的嘴里窜了出来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Calligos bares his teeth ominously, the old man quickly starts whispering something into a strange seashell-like adornment he wears. Brown sparks flash in Calligos's hair, and a cloud of steam suddenly bursts from your mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当温特斯凯尔咧开嘴，露出残酷的笑容时，老人迅速对着某个形似海贝的古怪饰品呢喃起来。棕色的火花在卡里戈斯头发上绽开，你的嘴里也突然吐出一团蒸汽。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Voyant Calligos montrer les dents d'un air menaçant, le vieil homme se met immédiatement à murmurer quelque chose dans un objet étrange qui ressemble à un coquillage. Des étincelles brunes crépitent dans les cheveux du libre-marchand et un nuage de vapeur jaillit soudain de votre bouche.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Calligos bares his teeth ominously, the old man quickly starts whispering something into a strange seashell-like adornment he wears. Brown sparks flash in Calligos's hair, and a cloud of steam suddenly bursts from your mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Voyant Calligos montrer les dents d'un air menaçant, le vieil homme se met immédiatement à murmurer quelque chose dans un objet étrange qui ressemble à un coquillage. Des étincelles brunes crépitent dans les cheveux du libre-marchand et un nuage de vapeur jaillit soudain de votre bouche.{/n}

languages.text: {n}カリゴスが不気味な歯をむき出しにすると、老人はすぐに貝殻を思わせる奇妙な飾りに向かって何かを囁き始める。カリゴスの髪に茶色の火花が散り、口から突然、蒸気が立ち上る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Calligos bares his teeth ominously, the old man quickly starts whispering something into a strange seashell-like adornment he wears. Brown sparks flash in Calligos's hair, and a cloud of steam suddenly bursts from your mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスが不気味な歯をむき出しにすると、老人はすぐに貝殻を思わせる奇妙な飾りに向かって何かを囁き始める。カリゴスの髪に茶色の火花が散り、口から突然、蒸気が立ち上る。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als Calligos unheilvoll seine Zähne entblößt, beginnt der alte Mann, etwas in ein seltsames muschelförmiges Schmuckstück zu flüstern. Braune Funken zucken in Calligos Haar und aus deinem Mund bricht plötzlich eine Wolke aus Dampf hervor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Calligos bares his teeth ominously, the old man quickly starts whispering something into a strange seashell-like adornment he wears. Brown sparks flash in Calligos's hair, and a cloud of steam suddenly bursts from your mouth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als ein grausames Grinsen Winterzunders Gesicht verzerrt, beginnt der Alte schnell etwas in eine merkwürdige Dekoration zu flüstern, die an eine Muschel erinnert. Braune Funken erblühen in den Haaren des Freihändlers, und aus deinem Mund steigt plötzlich eine Dampfwolke auf.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Calligos, dişlerini uğursuz bir şekilde sıkıyor. Bu sırada ihtiyar adam, üzerinde taşıdığı deniz kabuğu görünümlü tuhaf bir süse hızlıca bir şeyler fısıldamaya başlıyor. Calligos'un saçında kahverengi kıvılcımlar çakıyor ve aniden ağzından bir duman bulutu yayılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As Calligos bares his teeth ominously, the old man quickly starts whispering something into a strange seashell-like adornment he wears. Brown sparks flash in Calligos's hair, and a cloud of steam suddenly bursts from your mouth.{/n}
